DOC.brief_title: Quality Life With Arcoxia Women With Dysmenorrhea ( 0663-094 )
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman older 18 year old young 25 year old Voluntary agreement participate study signature inform consent Women clinical diagnosis dysmenorrhea Diagnosis secondary dysmenorrhea due : endometriosis , adenomyosis , malformation Muller 's conduct , uterine fibromyomas , ovarian cystic , pelvic varicocoele , inflammatory pelvic disease , adherence , intrauterine device , cervical channel stenosis , etc . Patients diagnosis acute inflammatory abdomen Patients diagnosis congestive heart disease , stroke ( 1 year ) , unstable angina , history myocardial infarction Women auto prescribe rescue medication dysmenorrheal pain study Women diagnosis mild dysmenorrhea
